metadata.title: CVE-2024-34509 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
dcmdata in DCMTK before 3.6.9 has a segmentation fault via an invalid DIMSEmessage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-34509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.4-2.1ubuntu0.1
libdcmtk14 - 3.6.4-2.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.4-2.1ubuntu0.1').
